7/10

O Jogo √© legal e divertido, mas muito mal feito, parece que est√° em um eterno beta. Se quer possui servidor, o Killer que hospeda a partida, o que faz demorar muito para encontrar algo com um bom ping, al√©m de n√£o possuir uma fila gerenciada, toda hora tem que kitar da sala, criar outra e convidar todo mundo novamente. Outra coisa que acontece √© que varias vezes voc√™ simplesmente n√£o conecta da partida, ou voc√™ conecta e alguem n√£o conectou e o time fica com um a menos. O ataque do killer tamb√©m te acerta as vezes mesmo sem encostar em voc√™. H√° varios outros pequenos detalhes que fazem parecer que o jogo foi feito pela metade, se quer da para experimentar roupas na loja, ao colocar uma pe√ßa a outra sai do seu corpo, n√£o podendo ver como ficaria um kit especifico. O jogo √© de 2016 e vendeu bastante, a empresa nem possui outros projetos (criou um recentemente) e se quer cuida desse que lhe rendeu tanto dinheiro. O unico suporte que d√£o √© o lan√ßamento de DLC's, mas o minimo que √© um servidor dedicado os mesmos n√£o fazem.
Gioco ottimo, tuttavia i bug non sono pochi. Apparte questo il gioco ti diverte moltissimo con amici e non. Consigliato al 100%

Dead by Daylight is a fantastic game sure it has its downsides when it comes to playing killer at high ranks but its still fun. You just have to ignore the toxicity like in every game. With the right people this game is very enjoyable and hilarious. I would like to see the devs make better decisions, but they are making some good ones here and there. I'm happy with the amount of new stuff they are releasing.

this game drains my life and my sanity, run if you see this its not too late yet.

Pros:
- it's really fun
- it's fair for both killers and survivors
- it has a good skill cap 
- it's easy to pick up even if you don't know much about the game

Cons:
- annoying players (pretty rarely) 
- it's hard to level up/get more perks at first
- some killers/survivors are better than others

Overall it's the best asymmetric multiplayer game I've ever played, so if you're looking for that, you should consider getting it.
This game is fun to play with your friends.

I just bought this game for 20‚Ç¨ only to realise I didn't get all of the content. Literally half of the survivors and killers are locked unless I buy DLCs or some "auric cells". If I wanted to buy all the DLCs to get the entire content I would have to spend over 50‚Ç¨. So the full game actually costs  way more than 20‚Ç¨.

I saw one guy commenting that microtransactions in the game are fair. In what world is it fair to spend 5‚Ç¨ on 500 auric cells only so you could buy one character?

Games with microtransactions should be free and the other way around, not both, period.

As far as the gameplay is considered, it's fun, but highly addictive (at least for me) so watch out.

Anyway, another greedy game by a greedy company, definitely don't recommend.
I thinks is a pretty good job so far...
Don't buy it , if you can play just a hour , you can see that's boring ,!
Es uno de los mejores juegos que eh juegado muy divertido pasarlo con amigos es lo mejor

Broken hitboxes, ridiculous gen process and still numerous bugs this game is totally unbalanced and never will be balanced after 3 years. Because devs only care spesific exploits regardless what actually needs to be done.Plus literally the game has the most toxic community ever, guess commonly children play this game rather than adults unfortunately. I don't recommend it anymore.

Bought it back when it came out and avoided it like the plague because of friends having not  bought it (and likely never would have) but with this free weekend I decided to give it a try with my brother and it's actually a fairly rewarding game that isn't based on entirely saving yourself and it feels impactful when you are altruistic compared to playing selfishly like in similar games.

I would recommend this game to people who like routine. This is the game I play when i need a break from other games. Its honestly a blast.  I think the hag and pig are wayyy overpowering- but they are also the most challenging which can be fun. The only thing I honeslty dont like about this game is when killers camp the hooks. But of course the game makers cant control that. Overal its a wonderful game.

Etant un ancien sur le jeu, je peux me permettre d'√©mettre un point n√©gatif, le taux de joueur "toxic" (je parle des campeurs) augmente de plus en plus... DbD, ein Spiel f√ºr die ganze Familie. Man kann gemeinsam im Keller abh√§ngen (macht besonders mit einem Insidious Killer Spa√ü) , vor einem Killer davon st√ºrmen oder Generatoren reparieren. 
Immer wenn du denkst, du hast es geschafft, kommt von hinten ein NOED Killer und klatscht dich weg! Oder du kommst dank Blutw√§chter, Kein Ausweg ect einfach nicht aus diesem Ausgang raus. 

Mittlerweile habe ich √ºber 2800 Stunden und was soll ich sagen, ich spiele dieses Spiel immernoch! 
Am tollsten sind die Drunk by Daylight Abende. Schnappt euch drei weitere Leute, stellt Regeln auf wann getrunken werden muss und schwubb die wupp macht das Spiel gleich doppelt so viel Spa√ü :P 

Mittlerweile gibt es soviele Perks, Killer, Survivor und es werden immer mehr! Da kommt man schon kaum noch mit was es alles so gibt und wie man es am besten kombinieren kann, egal Perk Roulette regelt!

Habt Spa√ü, weniger Toxic sein und ran an den Speck...√§hm Survivor....√§hm Generator....
Company has fallen victim to the wokeadile monster. Was good once upon a time but all they care about now is virtue signaling and poor gameplay choices

Bueno para comenzar es un juego supremamente espectacular, te pone en el papel de un superviviente que junto a otras 3 personas fueron atraidos a una pesadilla sin fin por una criatura conocida como ''el ente'' que se alimenta de tu esperanza, y para poder obtener la misma te obliga a reparar generadores siendo perseguido por una criatura invocada por el mismo ente con la unica esperanza de que al completar dichos generadores, esa puerta que abres sea la que te llevara a casa o por otro lado como una criatura solo llena de ira invocada por el ente para sacrificar mas victimas en su nombre.

El juego como tal es espectacular,  tiene de todo, diversion, miedo, accion y etc, la variedad de personajes es fantastica desde los asesinos que varian en sus habilidades para todos los gustos, a los supervivientes que hay  cumplen funciones de lideres, medicos, alguien que para los golpes por ti xd, etc, actualmente cuenta con muchos DLC pero no se asusten de esto, pues a partir del 10 de junio todo va a poder ser desbloqueado por medio del juego como tal, tampoco se asusten porque los asesinos son ''muy rotos o muy desbalanceados'' solo es practicar un poco y trabajar en equipo para darse cuenta que ni el doctor con toda su locura puede atraparte el 100% de las veces.

En lo personal lo recomiendo al 100% y si lo compran y son muy nuevos y no entienden que hacer y se quieren reir un rato conmigo y compa√±ia, los invito a agregarme que aunque no somos los mejores jugadores del juego nos hecharemos las risas muriendo todos en familia <3

Hay mucho de que hablar de este juego

Para empezar trata de 4 victimas vs un asesino la partida puede variar mucho si el asesino es pro segurisimo van a perder las victimas y si es noob ganan y no se puede decir que el asesino es mas cheto que las victimas todo depende de quien lo maneja aunque al principio jugar como asesino es muy dificil ya que hay que estar pendiente de 4 personas
pero con el tiempo se va mejorando Bueno como decia esas 4 victimas deben reparar 5 generadores una vez echo podran abrir la puerta de salida (pero siempre con el asesino detras)algo que hay que decir que algunos asesinos son extremadamente camperos y con ese tipo de jugadores es imposible jugar.Una vez abran esa puerta tendran que salir y habran ganado ya es decision de uno escapar solo y dejar atras a los demas o ayudarlos.
Si el asesino le da 1 golpe a alguien entrara en estado herido y luego con el segundo golpe lo tumba luego de eso lo tiene que llevar a un gancho y colgarlo ahi es cuando los compa√±eros de la victima tendran que salvarlo.
Para cada accion hay un desafio cuando reparas un generador debes en cuando 
aparecera un circulo con una raya y tendras que esperar al momento indicado para darle si fallas le daras una alerta al asesino y tendras que alejarte si no quieres que te atrape.
Tambien hay un inventario en el que puedes comprar items para la partida o encontrarlos durante la partida botiquines cajas de herramientas etc. Ademas de muchas habilidades que mejoran tu personaje


Bueno ahora viene la parte final del analisis vamos a ver algunas caracteristicas

Mucha genete dice que es dificil subir de nivel un survivor pero es la gracia que siempre tengas que esforzarte para conseguir las cosas as√≠ que eso depnde de cada uno

Tambien se puede decir que es un poco repetitivo ya que cada partida trata de lo mismo pero ya depende de uno ami
hasta ahora disfruto cada partida y no me aburro 

El nivel de innovacion es bastante bueno ya que es algo distinto a lo que estamos acostumbrados a ver

Y por ultimo la tencion que genera una persecucion es bastante buena

Conclusion Esta muy bueno y recomiendo comprarlo ademas de que vicia mucho lo que si es un poco caro as√≠ que recomiendo esperar a una oferta 10/10

I hate this game
But I can't stop playing it
Kill me

Don't get me wrong I love the game but there are some things that make it really bad. First is P2W...It's p2w because there are killers that are way stronger than the free to play ones.For example Fredie Kruger is extreme op(almost impossible to escape from him if he is behind you). I don't think anyone wants to buy a DLC/Expansion that is more expensive than the actual game.I see a lot of games that do that and often they don't succesed. The only way to win is to buy dlcs and play as the killer(which is not fun for me). I bought the deluxe edition expecting that I will get all the dlcs,this is the case with most games, but this one doesn't give any dlc. Just a soundtrack. Too much P2W. Second Campers.DBD community is really really toxic.Most of the new players (and sometimes veteran players) camp around the hook when they hook you. That is really annoying because non of your teammates can save you. Third really selfish players. When people remove you from the hook they don't care if the killer is near or not. They just unhook you and in most cases the killer kills you and the other player escapes and you lose a life because of him(by life i mean how many times you can get hooked). Sometimes they don't even revive you they just repair engines, heal themselves.Basically they try to escape by themselves. And the last part of the pizzle is that there is not enough ways to escape from the killer. Yeah sure you get perks but for new people its gonna be hard  + they don't give that much of a chance to escape. The only way to escape is too use the barricades(I mean when he is right behind you. You can't hide). In general i really don't recommend the game. I recommend it only if you have money 2 buy the dlcs and play as the killer. Fix your game DEVS. I forgot to say that there is one more thing. The killer is super fast and when you drop from high you have to stand up and that takes like 2 seconds but for the killer its like 0,5-1 sec

Aggiornamento 02/11/2020
Onestamente quando ho comprato questo gioco, l'ho preso sapendo che sarebbe durato a vita. Se adesso non riesci a giocare in modo stabile nemmeno a 20 FPS su una GTX 1050ti + 16GB RAM + i7, this means the game has a big optimization problems and something went wrong with all those updates. I want ALL my money back.

Aggiornamento 31/10/2020
Dovrebbero dargli l'award come gioco pi√π buggato e meno ottimizzato del secolo. Riesce a laggare anche su un computer quantistico, e si scoprono in media 10 nuovi bug ad ogni partita.

Rivedo la mia recensione 2 anni dopo, riconfermando il fatto che il gioco presenta ancora gli stessi gravi problemi facilmente risolvibili:
1. Le collisioni fatte male (specialmente in prossimit√† di finestre e pallet)
2. Code eterne per una partita, spesso le partite vengono annullate e devi rifare la coda: ci vuole molto a mettere una variabile che, nel caso in cui la partita non inizia per un problema non tuo, ti mettono in priorit√† nella coda (scavalcando gli altri)? Non penso.

Insomma, tanti aggiornamenti, tanti incassi, ma poca sostanza, soprattutto in quei punti che danno TROPPO fastidio rendendo il gioco disgustevole e che soprattutto richiederebbero un centesimo del tempo investito nel fare nuovi killer, mappe, perks e sopravvissuti... ma indovinate? Non produrrebbe incassi... quindi perch√© perderci anche quel minimo che serve?
